channel.title: Bucketface
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bucketface" - New Mono ally?

item.title: Re: Bucketface
item.content:encoded: Bucketface was given through a bet. AFAIK, only 1 guy has him. With the Sevens change, he might be in Mono somewhere.

item.title: Re: Bucketface
item.content:encoded: I can remember that some of the advanced players had a theory, that he is crank locked…but i think that was before recode!

item.title: Re: Bucketface
item.content:encoded:
i know he exists because I saw him on the Friend rankings the day (or maybe the day after) he was submitted to the wiki. I have no idea how to get him (yet)
The freind rankings only shows allies how has players with a higher Friend Level than 1000 with them, so it simply means only a few players have him/use him
As for him to not be in the Ally list here, it is now updated

item.title: Bucketface
item.content:encoded:
http://bvswiki.com/allies:bucketface

A friend showed me the link and told me that this ally is in the game for a while now…
But he is not in the friend rankings or in the wiki ally list!

Does anyone has more detailed infos?
